question: Which of the following is NOT correct about Group 14 elements?
option2: Melting points are much higher than those of corresponding elements of group 13
explanation: All members of group 14 are solids. Carbon and silicon are non-metals, germanium is a metalloid, whereas tin and lead are soft metals. Melting points and boiling points of group 14 elements are much higher than those of corresponding elements of group 13.
